text:
Hi everyone, my name is Emir and I’ve founded CustomerVox. CustomerVox is a Shopify application that helps growth-focused Shopify stores provide a superior shopping experience through personalized & relevant communication for each individual customer, on every visit.
Every week, I’m writing fairly in-depth articles and guides and want to start producing a weekly newsletter. I’m looking for a strong writer/editor on part-time basis with a b2b&ecommerce background to help me turn the content I produce into something great as well as produce content from time to time. If interested or you know someone who might be a great fit, dm me.
